messages.message: Confirming that agent mode is available only in commercial+ ?

vs community, you mean Melissa?

I don't know that we're really being thoughtful about feature gating between community v commercial at this point given impending deprecation. @Serena can you confirm?

right now, we don't gate agent mode on community vs commercial vs enterprise

agreed that it doesn't seem useful if we want to deprecate legacy mode very soon

K, that's easier for me, but it doesn't position this as an upsell.

We were planned to deprecate community mid-June, so...tbd.
